db:abstract.db:para: A QML example about reading and displaying NFC Data Exchange Format (NDEF) messages.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += qml quick network nfc
SOURCES += \ qmlposter.cpp
TARGET = qml_poster TEMPLATE = app
RESOURCES += \ poster.qrc
OTHER_FILES += \ poster.qml
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/nfc/poster INSTALLS += target
